alertDefProperties.name: AWS EKS - Node CPU utilization >80%
alertDefProperties.description:
This alert triggers when the CPU utilization of nodes in an Amazon EKS cluster exceeds 80%. High CPU usage at the node level can impact the overall performance of the cluster.

Customization Guidance:

Threshold: Set at 80% CPU utilization, this threshold can be adjusted based on node capacity and workload demands.

Node Specificity: Focus on critical nodes where high CPU usage could affect the entire cluster.

Notification Frequency: Ensure that alerts are frequent enough to catch spikes in CPU utilization early.

Action: Monitor node performance, optimize workloads, and scale nodes if necessary.

metricFilter.promql: avg(amazonaws_com_ContainerInsights_node_cpu_usage_total_avg{NodeName!=""}) by (ClusterName, NodeName, cloud_region, cloud_account_id) / avg(amazonaws_com_ContainerInsights_node_cpu_limit_avg{NodeName!=""}) by (ClusterName, NodeName, cloud_region, cloud_account_id) * 100
